TITLE: Episode 110 - The Social Justice Murder Cult with The Odd Man Out [Adult Language]
DESCRIPTION: This week, we are joined by The Odd Man Out. On his show, The Oddcast, he covers hidden history, the occult, fringe Christianity, philosophy, and cults. This week, he joins us to discuss the most deadly non-governmental Social Justice cult in history, Jim Jones' the Peoples Temple and their commune in Jonestown, Guyana. Join us to explore the dangers of this socialist cult.
